question: Can you tell me about the most Earth-like exoplanet discovered and generate an image of what it might look like?

steps.content: Can you tell me about the most Earth-like exoplanet discovered and generate an image of what it might look like?
Plan: 1) Search for the most Earth-like exoplanet discovered. 2) Generate an image of this exoplanet. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the most Earth-like exoplanet discovered.
The most Earth-like exoplanet discovered is Kepler-452b. It is located in the habitable zone of its star and has a similar size and orbit to Earth.
What is the distance of Kepler-452b from Earth?
Plan: 1) Search for the distance of Kepler-452b from Earth. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the distance of Kepler-452b from Earth.
Kepler-452b is approximately 1,400 light-years away from Earth.
